snippet.title: Abmis the Lion gameplay (PC Game, 1996)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Abmis the Lion, Dos PC game produced by ButtonSoft in 1996 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/abmis-the-lion/4760/
Abmis the Lion is a thrilling action game created in 1996. You need to collect all the items for a secret door to open to enter the next level.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Dangerous Dave 4 - Dave Goes Nutz - https://youtu.be/tz2Ql49skbQ
Blues Brothers 2 - https://youtu.be/HAWx_aY1e6I
Bio Menace 3 - https://youtu.be/5G0gjTRChXg
